mapper.sql:
FROM infrCommonCode a WHERE 1=1
AND a.ifccNameKor LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND a.ifccDelNY = 0
AND a.ifccDelNY = 1
ORDER BY a.ifccSeq ASC
mapper.select: SELECT a.ifccSeq ,a.ifccNameEng ,a.ifccNameKor ,a.ifccUseNY ,a.ifccDelNY ,a.ifccDescription ,a.infrCodeGroup_ifcgSeq ,ifccRegDatetime ,ifccModDatetime FROM infrCommonCode a WHERE 1=1 AND #{mainKey} = a.ifccSeq
SELECT DISTINCT a.ifcgSeq ,a.ifcgNameKor FROM infrCodeGroup a INNER JOIN infrCommonCode b on b.infrCodeGroup_ifcgSeq = a.ifcgSeq
mapper.update:
UPDATE infrCommonCode SET ifccDelNY = 1
WHERE ifccSeq = #{ifccSeq}
